meanings.definition: Worth having or wanting; attractive or appealing.

meanings.sent2: She always picks the most desirables outfits for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The desirables cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party.

meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was truly desirables.

meanings.definition: Things that are considered to be worth having or wanting.
